message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $14,000?
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the opportunity. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I am willing to pay $12,500 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one more move. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,750?
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $13,500 for the product.
I'm running out of room to maneuver, but I'll make one final push. Would you be willing to meet me at $14,000?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $13,250 for the product.
